title: The Catcher in the Rye
author: J.D. Salinger
description: A classic novel about the struggles and alienation of a teenage boy named Holden Caulfield.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
description: Set in the 1930s, this novel explores racial injustice and moral growth through the eyes of a young girl named Scout Finch.

author: George Orwell
description: A dystopian novel set in a totalitarian society, where the government controls every aspect of people's lives.

title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: A story of the American Dream, wealth, and love, set against the backdrop of the roaring 1920s.
